name: .FSLANG
summary: Learn about .FSLANG files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: FSLANG files are not meant to be opened. To use an FSLANG file with FastStone Capture or Image Viewer, make sure the file is stored in the program's Languages directory. Then, select Settings â†’ Language from the program's menu bar, and select the language that corresponds to your FSLANG file.
